event.title: 深圳鹤图人才引进申请
event.description:
1. 提交：在线提交文件（身份证、学历证书、劳动合同、项目证明）。
2. 处理：收到资格审核和面试邀请（时间：1-2周）。
3. 批准：通过面试和体检，获得录用通知（时间：1-2周）。
4. 激活：通过银行办理获得5万人民币的人才补贴。
event.description_en:
1. Submission: Submit documents online (ID card, degree certificate, labor contract, project proof).
2. Processing: Receive qualification review and interview invitation (Time: 1-2 weeks).
3. Approval: Pass interview and medical examination, receive employment notice (Time: 1-2 weeks).
4. Activation: Obtain talent subsidy of 50,000 RMB through bank processing.

event.title: 深圳鹤图人才引进申请(red tape)
event.description:
1. 前置障碍：从家乡城市获取信用检查和无黑名单记录。（障碍：多部门验证）（成本：至少1周用于记录转移）
2. “证明”搜寻：从以前雇主/单位收集盖章的项目证明。（障碍：分级盖章）（行动：预约）（成本：1-2天排队/旅行）
3. 提交：通过电子邮件/在线提交文件。
4. 信息黑洞：等待数周无状态更新。（障碍：缺乏透明度）（成本：高度焦虑）
5. 强制查询：打电话/发电子邮件/访问河谷发展办公室查询状态。（行动：积极追逐）（成本：更多努力/交通）
6. “切片”请求：收到关于“补充材料”的通知（例如，额外的翻译），这些材料最初并未列出。（障碍：隐藏规则/模糊要求）（成本：再等1-2周）
7. 批准：通过并获得通知。
8. 大陆延迟：在公安局办理工作签字，但面临由于“系统协调”导致的延迟。（障碍：系统低效）（成本：3-7个工作日）
9. 激活：通过银行激活，但补贴因财政审查而延迟。
10. 最终获得5万人民币的人才补贴。
event.title_en: Shenzhen Hetu Talent Introduction Application (red tape)
event.description_en:
1. Prerequisite Hurdle: Obtain credit check and no blacklist record from hometown city. (Barrier: Multi-department Verification) (Cost: At least 1 week for record transfer)
2. The “Proof” Hunt: Collect stamped project proof from previous employers/units. (Barrier: Hierarchical Stamping) (Action: Appointments) (Cost: 1-2 days queuing/travel)
3. Submission: Submit documents via email/online.
4. Information Black Hole: Wait for weeks with no status updates. (Barrier: Lack of Transparency) (Cost: High Anxiety)
5. Forced Inquiry: Call/Email/Visit Hetu Development Office to inquire about status. (Action: Active Chasing) (Cost: More Effort/Transport)
6. The “Salami Slicing” Request: Receive notification about “supplementary materials” (e.g., extra translations) that were not listed initially. (Barrier: Hidden Rule/Vague Requirement) (Cost: Wait another 1-2 weeks)
7. Approval: Pass and receive notice.
8. Mainland Delay: Go to Public Security Bureau to process work endorsement, but face delays due to “system coordination”. (Barrier: System Inefficiency) (Cost: 3-7 working days)
9. Activation: Activate through bank, but subsidy delayed due to financial review.
10. Finally receive talent subsidy of 50,000 RMB.
